repeat.name: repeat
repeat.description: Returns a new function which when applied to an argument, has the same effect as applying the specified function to the same argument n times.

thrice.name: thrice
thrice.description: Returns a new function which when applied to an argument, has the same effect as applying the specified function to the same argument 3 times.

twice.name: twice
twice.description: Returns a new function which when applied to an argument, has the same effect as applying the specified function to the same argument 2 times.
